# Meticulous (Drawback)
## Overview
**Meticulous:** You plan and prepare everything in detail, and aren't good at improvising when things don't go as planned. You take a â€”2 penalty on skill checks for skills with which you're untrained.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
